mapper.select: SELECT no, sno, cno, title, content, regdate, count, article_like, article_dislike, user_id FROM k_article WHERE sno=#{sno} and cno=#{cno} ORDER BY no desc
mapper.insert: INSERT into k_article(no, sno, cno, title, content, img_url, user_id) values(seq_no.nextval, #{sno}, #{cno}, #{title}, #{content}, #{img_url}, #{user_id})
